# STATS 765: Project - Exploratory Data Analysis

## Setup

1. Load all files.
```{r}
library("tidyverse")
path <- "./data"
df_victimizations <- read_csv(paste(path, "/victimizations-data.csv", sep = ""), show_col_types = FALSE)
df_census <- read_csv(
   paste(path, "/2023_Census_totals_by_topic_for_households_by_SA2.csv", sep = ""),
   show_col_types = FALSE
)
df_meshblock <- read_csv(
   paste(path, "/meshblock-higher-geographies-2023-generalized.csv", sep = ""),
   show_col_types = FALSE
)
```

1. Remove unnecessary columns.
```{r}
df_meshblock <- df_meshblock |> select(c(
   MB2023_V1_00,
   SA22023_V1_00,
   SA22023_V1_00_NAME,
))
```

1. Join victimizations with meshblock

```{r}
df_meshblock <- df_meshblock |>
   mutate(
      Meshblock = as.numeric(MB2023_V1_00),
   )
df_merge <- inner_join(df_victimizations, df_meshblock, by = "Meshblock")
```

1. Join census with the rest

```{r}
df_merge <- inner_join(df_census, df_merge, by = c("Statistical area 2 (SA2) 2023 code" = "SA22023_V1_00"))
```

1. Statistics

```{r}
dim(df_victimizations)
dim(df_census)
dim(df_meshblock)
dim(df_merge)
```
